effect.diamond_pearl: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.platinum: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.platinum: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.
flavor_text.platinum: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.
